name: Crunchy Balls: Lite
description:
Crunchy Balls : Lite

Experience this fun casual tap to pop balls game full of surprises. Get the best tap to pop game available online and dive into immersive and addictive game play. So, warm up your fingers and start tapping to pop up moving balls, open buckets full of balls, freeze them, gain one ups, avoid hazards and so much more fun to play game elements.

So, what are you waiting for? Grab the game for free and have fun

*Lite version gives 21 levels of game play

*More than 3 special items

*More levels will be available soon
